Please Note: All donations for my games go directly to support the Technology Cooperative, a 501c3 nonprofit organization founded to create a technology-focused community that provides computer-related technology access and awareness.

This game was created in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare #31 under the theme "entire game on one screen". We decided to combine the fun of idle games like cookie clicker with the RPG setting of games like Dragon Age.

The development team was myself, my wife, and my two oldest daughters (we entered the game jam as a team).
